00019 void RobotBase::setInstance(RobotBase* robot)
00020 {
00021     wpi_assert(m_instance == NULL);

00050 RobotBase::~RobotBase()
00051 {
00052     SensorBase::DeleteSingletons();
00053     delete m_task;
00054     m_task = NULL;
00055     m_instance = NULL;
00056 }

00126 void RobotBase::robotTask(FUNCPTR factory, Task *task)
00127 {
00128     RobotBase::setInstance((RobotBase*)factory());
00129     RobotBase::getInstance().m_task = task;
00130     RobotBase::getInstance().StartCompetition();
00131 }
00132 
00141 void RobotBase::startRobotTask(FUNCPTR factory)
00142 {
00143     if (strlen(SVN_REV))
00144     {
00145         printf("WPILib was compiled from SVN revision %s\n", SVN_REV);
00146     }
00147     else
00148     {
00149         printf("WPILib was compiled from a location that is not source controlled.\n");
00150     }
00151 
00152     // Check for startup code already running
00153     INT32 oldId = taskNameToId("FRC_RobotTask");
00154     if (oldId != ERROR)
00155     {
00156         // Find the startup code module.
00157         char moduleName[256];
00158         moduleNameFindBySymbolName("FRC_UserProgram_StartupLibraryInit", moduleName);
00159         MODULE_ID startupModId = moduleFindByName(moduleName);
00160         if (startupModId != NULL)
00161         {
00162             // Remove the startup code.
00163             unldByModuleId(startupModId, 0);
00164             printf("!!!   Error: Default code was still running... It was unloaded for you... Please try again.\n");
00165             return;
00166         }
00167         // This case should no longer get hit.
00168         printf("!!!   Error: Other robot code is still running... Unload it and then try again.\n");
00169         return;
00170     }
00171 
00172     // Let the framework know that we are starting a new user program so the Driver Station can disable.
00173     FRC_NetworkCommunication_observeUserProgramStarting();
00174 
00175     // Start robot task
00176     // This is done to ensure that the C++ robot task is spawned with the floating point
00177     // context save parameter.
00178     Task *task = new Task("RobotTask", (FUNCPTR)RobotBase::robotTask, Task::kDefaultPriority, 64000);
00179     task->Start((INT32)factory, (INT32)task);
00180 }

00195     }
00196 };
00197 static RobotDeleter g_robotDeleter;
